original: LUNDIN, Klas Axel, Fabrikör, Eskilstuna, f Mellösa, Sörml l, 30/1 83, gm Jenny Forsberg. Inneh tills m fabr S J Lindberg AB Lundin & Lindberg Metallvarufabr i Eskilstuna.
translated: LUNDIN, Klas Axel, Manufacturer, Eskilstuna, born in Mellösa, Sörml l, January 30, 1883, married to Jenny Forsberg. Involved with the company S J Lindberg AB Lundin & Lindberg Metal Goods Factory in Eskilstuna.

memberOf.name: S J Lindberg AB Lundin & Lindberg Metal Goods Factory

career.workplace: S J Lindberg AB Lundin & Lindberg Metal Goods Factory
